text: How you can control your privacy Open menu Help Center Help topics Using Twitter Managing your account Safety and security Rules and policies Guides New user FAQ Glossary A safer Twitter Our rules My privacy Getting Started Guide Contact us Search Go to Twitter Sign out Sign in Search this site Search How you can control your privacy Managing your privacy settings We want you to have the resources you need to manage your privacy experience on Twitter. Learn more about the settings and tools you can use to control your privacy preferences below. These videos highlight our desktop experience, but you have access to these controls on your mobile device too. Your browser does not support the video element.
